item.title: cli utilty to manage your github gist
item.description:
Github Gist or PasteBin, it's kind of service allow you to post single files. For me, the only backdraw is Gist don't have a nice cli client.

I found a nice cli utilty of Github Gist. github.com/b4b4r07/gist
